did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Essays written using holdings of the Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, 1892-2007.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Collection consists of theses, essays, talks, and articles written through the use of collections now housed in the Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of theses, essays, talks, and articles written through the use of collections now housed in the Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections.

prefercite.head: Cite As:

odd.p: Individual items cataloged as subunits of parent records.

scopecontent.p: All the material in the collection may not be covered by this guide.
